Mr. A owns a home worth $ \$ 10000$. He sells it to Mr. B at a $ 10\%$ profit based on the worth of the house. Mr. B sells the house back to Mr. A at a $ 10\%$ loss. Then:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \text{A comes out even} \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ \text{A makes }\$ 1100\text{ on the deal}\qquad \textbf{(C)}\ \text{A makes }\$ 1000\text{ on the deal}$ $ \textbf{(D)}\ \text{A loses }\$ 900\text{ on the deal} \qquad\textbf{(E)}\ \text{A loses }\$ 1000\text{ on the deal}$
